===================================

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: ExclusionConstraint(*, name, expressions, index_type=None, condition=None, deferrable=None, include=None, opclasses=(), violation_error_message=None)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.db.models.BaseConstraint`


   .. py:attribute:: template
      :value: 'CONSTRAINT %(name)s EXCLUDE USING %(index_type)s (%(expressions)s)%(include)s%(where)s%(deferrable)s'



   .. py:attribute:: expressions


   .. py:attribute:: index_type
      :value: 'GIST'

      :value: None

      :value: None
